thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Hotel, Paris-Boulogne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Boulogne-Billancourt, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First visit to Paris -
thread.title_full: First visit to Paris - Review of Radisson Blu Hotel, Paris-Boulogne, Boulogne-Billancourt, France - TripAdvisor

author: David R
title: First visit to Paris -
text:
Work brought me to Paris for the first time, and our company meetings were here in the hotel. What a pleasant stay. Staff was friendly, rooms were comfortable, banquet facilities were suitable.
Location was convenient to the metro and several local eateries.
If I had to complain, it would be about the HVAC and the fitness center. No matter what I did I couldn't get the temperature in the room to a good level. Had to sleep with the window open, and when you're on the street side it's a little noisy.
The fitness center is way to small for a hotel this size. It is nice, just small.
Thanks for the hospitality!
